summary: Well hello there, here is the first chapter of my new Skyrim series, The Evil Awakens. If you have been following, then you probably know I wanted to attempt on making a more cinematic feeling series but keeping my style from the days of Oblivion. Please leave me comments or messages, your feedback really tells me what you like and don't like.
descriptionHtml:
Well hello there, here is the first chapter of my new Skyrim series, The Evil Awakens. If you have been following, then you probably know I wanted to attempt on making a more cinematic feeling series but keeping my style from the days of Oblivion. Please leave me comments or messages, your feedback really tells me what you like and don't like. Also feel free to share this video with anyone you like or on any site. Just post credits. Thank you for watching! And thanks to all those great mod creators that made this possible!

Feel free to watch this on my Youtube Channel Or download it for full quality!! ( 1080p DOWNLOAD COMING SOON!! )

Download will be up soon, please use the video tab to watch the movie from there on my YT Channel.
author: Shlexi55
